price: Yaa warra amantan! Akka warra Muusaa rakkifnaani hintahinaa. Rabbiin waan isaan jedhan irraa isa (Muusaa) qulqulleesse. Innis Rabbiin biratti kabajamaa ta’eera.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاذَوۡاْ مُوسَىٰ فَبَرَّأَهُ ٱللَّهُ مِمَّا قَالُواْۚ وَكَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَجِيهٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takūnū ka-alladhīna ādhaw mūsā fabarra-ahu al-lahu mimmā qālū wakāna ʿinda al-lahi wajīhan
